website_summaries.verdict: These sets from GoSports give you choices in size and shape, and throw in six agility cones to boot.
pros: Choice of 2.5-foot round goal set, 4-foot round or square set, or 6-foot round set
Includes two goals, six cones, and carrying case
You also get plastic and metal stakes to attach goal to ground
Fiberglass poles and nylon fabric and netting
cons: The poles may not keep their shape, and are light enough that they fold over on themselves on windy days

customer_reviews.title: Soccer Coach Approved! Easy to close back up!
customer_reviews.text: As a youth & high school soccer coach, these pop-up goals are such a necessity. This particular brand and style is excellent (I've tried out many). It comes with TWO goals inside ONE carrying case with a zipper. They are lightweight and VERY EASY TO CLOSE BACK UP! That is key for me - I'm always in a rush. It's also easy for my players to close them up too - delegation, people! So awesome that this set comes with disc cones too. You can never have enough cones. I leave this in my trunk and I'm good to go. I highly recommend this pop-up soccer goal. 5 STARS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Them things pop!
customer_reviews.text: Careful. I took those to the over field. Once you release them they really pop fast! One came to my chest then landed on my 3 y/o then I was laughing so hard and I looked drunk and crazy so now I don’t have any mommy friends. I’m a lonely soccer mom. But this is a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: ConsumerTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: High quality, easy to store, great price
customer_reviews.text: This is the all-in-one package. Small enough nets to focus on accuracy, but big enough to have fun. 4 stakes make it easy to secure to the ground & when all is said & done, super easy to collapse & store in a small space. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, durable and lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using these goals for about 2 months 3 times a week with my U10 soccer team. Very happy to see how sturdy, durable and lightweight these goals are. Very easy to fold up and carry to any field we like to practice at. I particularly like that was this design has the ground hooks attached. With a previous set of goals I had we kept on losing the hooks, very glad this won’t happen again. Very happy with the choice I made in purchasing these goals!
customer_reviews.author: Harold Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect-Just what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.text: My son is starting to get into soccer and wants to practice at the house. This is a perfect set. As he gets older I imagine we'll need larger nets, but it's perfect at this time. I only gave 4 stars on durability, we haven't had this long and I will update this rating after some use.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Not durable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in late December 2017. My kids have used them a handful of times because they’re supposed to be back ups and not regular use. A couple months ago my kids had them out and the straps providing the tension on both goals snapped. It looks like it’s made of super rugged strapping but I can tear it with my bare hands. It’s sewn onto the goal at the ends, so barring getting a sewing machine out, the best I can do is try a bungee cord. Also, one of the bands holding a stake also broke. Given we haven’t used these that much, I’m pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! The goals pop up easily and secure to the ground. We purchased the 4' goals for our 3 year old and he can easily move them around the yard and secure them wherever he wants to set play his game. The size is great for him, I think for any child over 5 you would want to go up to the 6' goal. I love that it has the case so we can put them away (though they've only been folded up once because they are always wanted).
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Great product will definitely buy again or as a gift!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I bought for my son and He has really enjoyed it and it is durable! We actually have been leaving it pinned down outside and it has not damaged at all. If your undecided on the size, it has helped my son to get the Smallest as it has helped with him aim!
customer_reviews.author: Vicente

customer_reviews.title: Very cool but ultimately didn't last for us.
customer_reviews.text: The straps lasted about three months and the wrap on the frames is ripping too. The strap is the only thing that keeps the goals, well, goal shaped and both ripped within a couple weeks of each other. The strap itself is well deteriorated so sewing it back together is out. We're buying some new strapping to hopefully salvage these. But still the wrapping is already ripping too. Really disappointed they aren't likely gonna make one year of use, even when we are replacing parts to repair.
customer_reviews.author: mrm

customer_reviews.title: Solid little goals
customer_reviews.text: I coach 7 year olds and these are awesome. The kids are able to help me set them up and take them down and they fit right in the included bag. The previous brand I bought did not last a whole season, these look good as new after several months of 3 practices a week.
customer_reviews.author: 808guitarz

customer_reviews.title: Well made and priced
customer_reviews.text: I have a 14 month old son and enrolled him in a soccer class so I wanted to get a portable net to see if he would take to soccer. This net is not only portable but it is well made and easy to use. Everything fits easily into the included bag and the instructions for packing/unpacking the net are conveniently sewed onto the net frame. The price was also reasonable as I didn't want to spend too much money in case my son ended up not liking it. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Tyfighter

customer_reviews.title: Son.loves it
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this. He wants to practice soccer all the time now.
customer_reviews.author: IvorySnowGirl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a soccer family!
customer_reviews.text: This product had great reviews and lives up to those reviews. With several teenagers using it who take their soccer seriously this product has held up well. It is easy to set up and take down and can be used for may soccer activities and drills.
customer_reviews.author: StanR

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for learning soccer
customer_reviews.text: These are great for taking to the park or using in our yard. Stores flat, which is great for our small home with limited space.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids soccer practices.
customer_reviews.text: Have used it for one season with under 8 year olds and these are good goals for various exercises that don't require a goalie nor strong shooting technique. they are good for 1v1, 2v2, 3v3 games so kids learn the technique to get close shots on goal. easy set up and takedown and storage.
customer_reviews.author: Nukumach

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to fold!!
customer_reviews.text: Very durable. I coach 3 year old soccer and the kids run into it all the time haha. It has held up really well!!
customer_reviews.author: Allie Elms

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: These goals seem easier to fold up and have 4 different places for stakes. I have only used the goals 4 times. The first day out, one of the stakes tore off its bungee cord like attachment. I have my fingers crossed. I am hoping to repair with paracord and hopefully , hopefully get 2 seasons out of these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and very easy to fold and use. Can be used indoors.
customer_reviews.text: Fun! I can’t speak to durability as we just got this recently but looks to be lasting
customer_reviews.author: vmbarr2

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginning soccer!
customer_reviews.text: This is our first year coaching soccer (U8) and the pop up goals are working out very well for the kids. Easy to transport, don’t get knocked over easily, etc. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Roskelley

customer_reviews.title: Great intro set of goals for a small child
customer_reviews.text: We got this goal for my son who was 3 at the time. The goals seem decently sturdy. As of retiring this we’ve only used them a couple times. But they are super easy to fold and come in a convenient carrying case. I like the stakes attached to the goals so I don’t have to worry about my son kicking the goals all over the yard
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Good quality for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product. Have used it a few times and it’s been a great experience so far.
customer_reviews.author: Niels Berg

customer_reviews.title: Great product for price
customer_reviews.text: Super easy. Great quality. Perfect for on the go easy setup.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Whigham

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT NOW
customer_reviews.text: just perfect!! popped the goals out the bag released the 2 velcros and poof!! 4 stakes to hold each goal down. comes with cones for drills or side lines. comes with instructions, in color, great pictures if your having difficulties. great product for a low price, glade with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My kids really love this set! Easy to set up and Take down. Perfect storage bag too.
customer_reviews.author: BMP

customer_reviews.title: Great Birthday Gift
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for our five-year-old grandson. He loved his birthday gift. The goals are easy to set up, take down, and pack away. Price was right.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Favorite soccer set
customer_reviews.text: We've tried lots of soccer sets and we love this one! The goals come with stakes so they don't move around. Goals are the perfect size for our 4 and 7 year old. We've played big games with them. I like that cones and a carrying case comes with it. We've bought several more as gifts for friends.
customer_reviews.author: CurlyMom

customer_reviews.title: Really sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty heavy duty. I got the medium sized set and they fold up pretty easily even though it seems like the poles will crack if you bend them too far. Just follow the directions and it is easy enough to twist up. The stakes are thick, they are plastic but seem like they will last. I like that they come with some little half cones for drills.
customer_reviews.author: J. Salvia-Quiroz

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it! Our soccer kiddo wanted nets to play with but when it arrived she and her siblings played with it together for hours. Kids set it up and took it down without issues.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great for youth soccer!
customer_reviews.text: Great for our kids that just started soccer. Folds up easily but still sturdy enough to practice with. Make sure you read the instructions on how to fold it because I can see how it might be a challenge. Also came with cones
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied Customer

customer_reviews.title: 3 months & it broke :(
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that this product broke after 3 months with only occasional use. The white band along the bottom of the front of the goal desintegrated at the seams & shredded throughout the whole length on both goals. They were kept in the case and used only a couple times. It was something that was fun, easy to transport & store, but needs to be made from better quality materials because we should’ve been able to enjoy it longer.
customer_reviews.author: CONNIE B.

customer_reviews.title: Great set at a great value!
customer_reviews.text: After reading numerous reviews, we bought the 4ft set. Couldn't be more pleased! The 4ft set is the perfect size for our 7 and 4 yr old soccer players. And the quality is fantastic! Really like the little details like the velcro straps that hold the nets together when twisted, the pockets for the attached stakes and the extra set of metal stakes (nice touch). Everything fits in the bag which has handles for carrying. For the same price as ONE of the main brand name goals, we received 2 goals and a set of cones. A great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MAT

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and easy to use. Would recommend to anyone looking for a practical and easy goal for kids and adults.
customer_reviews.author: Silvia H.

customer_reviews.title: I love this and my grandson loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little deal. I probably could have got smaller ones because I set one up in my grandson's room. He can take them anywhere. Great product and well-made and the carry bag for it is awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Surprised at how well it holds up
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Good sturdiness to it. Not sure about the netting though, that'll have to go through the test of time and a 21 month old who likes to fall into it instead of kick the ball into it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great goals for preschoolers
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my four-year-old twins, who just started playing soccer. They're easy to set up, seem durable, and I love that they fold up and store in a bag. The cones also seem really nice. Highly recommend, especially for the affordable price!
customer_reviews.author: f. lastname

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Five year thinks he’s going pro, straight from the back yard to the big leagues.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fold and carry!
customer_reviews.text: Love these so far!! Only used a few times but easy to fold and carry with us places and my son loves them. (He is 4)
customer_reviews.author: Riian McEwen

customer_reviews.title: Great for young kids who practice at home.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my two grandsons(age 6 & 9) and they love them as they had been using child size plastic chairs as a goal. I would recommend them for any kid to use to practice in the back yard.
customer_reviews.author: John Lehman

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with these - excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for our toddler who is learning to play soccer... they fold up cleanly and with the provided storage bag, take up little space when not in use. Very similar, if not the exact same ones, that his Soccer Shots coach uses. They also include some nice cones to complete the package. Really believe this a solid product and an excellent value. Would highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Mikelas

customer_reviews.title: These are great goals, but the assembly strap broke in pieces within a year
customer_reviews.text: These are great lightweight storable goals, but the straps that give them their goal shape (As opposed to a flat net) disintegrated within a year of mellow use. This happened to both goals. We were able to fix them with some paracord for now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Popup Soccer Goals
customer_reviews.text: Great quality my kids love them. They play with them in the back yard and my daughter uses them to practice. She is on a soccer team. Her coach uses these ones too.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great Goals!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for my niece for her Birthday and she was soooo excited! Daddy took her to the park to practice and called to tell me they Love it! Great sturdy goals and they come with the spikes to hold them in place and a carrying bag! Perfect for soccer practice.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine L. Apel

customer_reviews.title: A very fun to use set! Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. My 8 year old and I use them to practice regularly. They are surfy enough for adult use, and fold up very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Dad of 4 | Husband of 1

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Portable Soccer Goals
customer_reviews.text: These portable goals are terrific - they are very easy to set up and easy to fold up. The included anchor system ensures the nets stay in place and the material the nets are made of should stand up to the stress the nets will be under from the balls hitting them. All in all I am very pleased I chose this product and MOst Highly Recommend It.
customer_reviews.author: W. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: We got this set for my son to train soccer at home and also for his incoming birthday party this weekend. Sofar my son has loved it and he has played with it several times outdoors. The quality seems good and it stands nicely. Size is also good having Into account that he is a tall 9 year old boy.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: This item was fine at first, but after two months, the straps that hole the goal together and create the "goal line" broke on both goals. Then last week, the steps that hold connect the stakes to the goal frame broke. Same material as the goal line. We probably used it a dozen times. Very poor quality. I have to believe some of the other reviews here aren't legit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son. It's totally worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Tamayo

customer_reviews.title: Five star
customer_reviews.text: These soccer goals are pretty cool. They are heavier duty than I expected and collapse into an almost envelope-thin bag. Makes storage easy.
customer_reviews.author: KLM

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old loves this. He loves to set it up and play. He invents new games with this set LOL. Easy to setup and pack it back up again once you are done
customer_reviews.author: Suchithra Ramaswamy

customer_reviews.title: Ok goal
customer_reviews.text: The white strap that holds the goal together broke on both goals at the same time a few months after I purchased them.
customer_reviews.author: George B. Toma

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I signed my daughter up for soccer and wanted to have this in my backyard so she can practice outside of her regular soccer schedule. It comes with everything you need to have a nice soccer game.
customer_reviews.author: iHeart

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: My teenagers use these goals in the house on carpet with a hover ball & over-sized rubber balls. They stay in place well without being staked down to anything. They fold up easily. Highly recommend these goals.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi D.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for Christmas. Very easy to fold up and stow away in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fold/unfold.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. I purchased 4’ for kids to play in the backyard.
customer_reviews.author: Shah73

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, I like the carrying case and cones that come with it
customer_reviews.author: Shelby

customer_reviews.title: Great easy soccer Net
customer_reviews.text: So happy we purchased this! Perfect for our backyard and 3yr old toddler. Came with cones, nets, and extra pieces! Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great for Kids!
customer_reviews.text: These goals are great! We bought the 4 ft square goals and they work perfectly for our kids. They pop up and stow easily, stay well anchored with the provided stakes and seem to be pretty durable. An add benefit is that they collapse when someone runs into one accidentally which can prevent injury. These are perfect for setting up in the yard, taking to the beach or park, or taking anywhere while traveling. The cones are nice for setting up boundaries or doing agility drills.
customer_reviews.author: Yoop

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it. It is light and a great product for your basement.
customer_reviews.author: Ally Walker

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than two month
customer_reviews.text: These goals lasted less than two months. They were great the first weeks but then they snapped and hit my son in the face when it happened. Besides being hurt, he was upset that the goals were no longer. Do not suggest these at all!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Dexter

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and value
customer_reviews.text: We Purchased the set for our 5 year old daughter who has taken a great interest in the sport recently. The goal appeard very similar to the ones used in her soccer clinics but a fraction of the cost plus it came in a set of 2 and included 6 cones. The quality seems just as good as the ones used in her clinic plus this one has built in stakes. We really like that, because we would definitely lose them otherwise. It is also folds up rather easily, and comes with a storage bag that is flat & convenient to store. Overall, so far, an excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Koch

customer_reviews.title: Excellent training tool for young ones
customer_reviews.text: Excellent training tool for young ones.Allll parts included, easy to setup and deploy. I am using to teach U5 team. I can setup on any field in about 5 mins. Also great with family to play on trips. This is a great product, quality built and I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: John Moen

customer_reviews.title: Most Importantly: Easy Down
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup, easy to take down, and they can handle the rough play that the 2 and 5 year old put them through. They've only bee indoors so far but they've been knocked over and stepped on many times without damage. I think the best part is that they fold so easily and store flat, we just slide them under the guest bed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Peer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: My son is completely obsessed with his goals and I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah veautour

customer_reviews.title: Easy to keep in the car and we are always ...
customer_reviews.text: They are very versatile. And hold up well. We’ve had them for a couple of years now. Easy to keep in the car and we are always ready for a pick up game!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon addicted

customer_reviews.title: Durable so far. The "cones" are a little bit ...
customer_reviews.text: Durable so far. The "cones" are a little bit lightweight, but do the job. Using this for U5 soccer practice and it takes everything the kids can throw at it.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for any soccer lover
customer_reviews.text: These made the perfect gift for my 3 boys for Christmas. They are easy to fold and put away after they are finished and don’t take up much room at all. They are also small enough to travel for vacations. We plan on taking them with us this summer to the beach!
customer_reviews.author: Mindy L McCormick

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: These goals work great and are easy to set up and take down. They are lightweight and easy to transport when in the case. There are stakes that are attached as well as a second set of stakes but we have not tried to put them in the ground yet...they stay upright just fine unless bumped into. The cones were a great bonus! I feel like the goals are a great value when compared to the more expensive versions out there.
customer_reviews.author: BDix

customer_reviews.title: Solid build. Cleverly thought-out.
customer_reviews.text: Overall solid build and material quality. Nicely packaged away. Clever mechanism for storing: good forethought with the velcro straps to keep the goals together while putting in the storage bag. Also has a white strap to show when ball crosses the line. I look forward to using these in the yard for quite some time.
customer_reviews.author: DBB

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for indoor & outdoor play
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our three kids for Easter (ages 10, 8 & 5). My husband and I were very happy with our purchase as we had been wanting goals for our kids that could be used outside in the summer, brought inside for the winter and easily stored. The size is perfect for our kids, not too big to use in the basement, but big enough to play soccer outside. Most importantly our kids love them and hauled them right to the basement to play a game of floor hockey.
customer_reviews.author: 5fowlers

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids!
customer_reviews.text: I like the goals because they help me play soccer with my mom, dad and sister. I got them from Santa and because it's winter, we're using them inside in our family room. I think other kids would like them, too. -Amelia, Age 6
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy Breezy Soccer Goal
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift. Goal is just the right size pops right up. My nieces loved it and played with it the next day. Easy to store due to size and you can carry the cones in the bag provided. A great gift for kids who love to play soccer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set of soccer nets and convenient for traveling to practice.
customer_reviews.text: The GoSports Pop-Up Soccer Goals and carry case has been great on our trips to the park and training camps. Folding the goals back up for storage is easy. There are also 8 metal spikes in a small bag (not pictured) for use w/ harder ground. The goals are holding up well and the joints are pretty sturdy. I recommend owners to put a towel in the bag to wipe down the stakes after use to keep the bag and nets clean.
customer_reviews.author: Tsuruman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: These were so easy to set up and put back in the bag once you follow the directions once. Putting away reminds me of folding the window shades. So easy once you figure it out. They are also durable!
customer_reviews.author: Sue E Slater

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun for the kids.
customer_reviews.text: Great for the back yard. Kids do try to use indoors but that's against the rules.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Huffman

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my three year old birthday. Went with this one because it came with two goals and a bag. This makes it easier to meet his friends in the park and play some kick ball :) this will grow with him at least till he is 6 or older. I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Adreal

customer_reviews.title: Pop up soccer nets
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for toddlers. Easy, pop up style. No ball included though.
customer_reviews.author: Darrit

customer_reviews.title: It's Great!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old Grandson loves it. It's great! Nice carrying case too.
customer_reviews.author: Golden4Life4ever

customer_reviews.title: strap broke
customer_reviews.text: Product seemed great, but the strap that keeps the goal curved and standing up completely disintegrated. Unfortunate, because we liked playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: mjsprinkles

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: These goals work really well. Bought them for my youth soccer team. Easy set up, nice carrying case, highly recommended. Should last several seasons. Thank you Amazon and Go Sports -Pete
customer_reviews.author: Peter Gabrich

customer_reviews.title: Straps snapped after few months
customer_reviews.text: Only owned for a few months and the straps in front that serve as the goal line snapped in half on both of the goals
customer_reviews.author: Bucci Family

customer_reviews.title: A successful gift.
customer_reviews.text: An affordable gift that gets this kids to go outside. I purchased it for Christmas and it was an instant hit!
customer_reviews.author: Owen

customer_reviews.title: Not durable, wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.text: One of the goal’s nylon strap broke within 2-weeks of use. Goal is not functional now. I would request a warranty or replacement, but not sure how to do that.
customer_reviews.author: W. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Bought these used like new. They came in excellent condition with just ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these used like new. They came in excellent condition with just a little mud on the spikes. The goals are great quality and and good as the name brand ones. Easy to open and close for storage. Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: JP Jr

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly and as described, however, it seems ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and as described, however, it seems much smaller in person. I even opted for a larger size. It will do but only so we don't have to deal with returning it.
customer_reviews.author: H. Miley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent portable soccer goals
customer_reviews.text: This is even better than I expected. The goals work and look great. They collapse down very easily and it all goes into the bag for traveling and storing. The attached stakes are a tiny bit thick for a hard lawn, but they work.
customer_reviews.author: SunnyvaleMike

customer_reviews.title: Happy with these
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the grandson who is learning to play soccer. They are not very wide, but like I told him, it helps improve his accuracy. Very easy to set up and anchor down.
customer_reviews.author: kiki3377

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to set up. Durable and kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mari C.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Pop-Up Goals
customer_reviews.text: These are a sturdier goal than what I have used in the past. We primarily play outside so the attached stakes are a benefit as well. Would recommend them for younger players.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: these goals seem to be good quality and are a great value compared to some ...
customer_reviews.text: While I haven't had a chance to use them extensively yet, these goals seem to be good quality and are a great value compared to some other brands. I like that they come as a pair, which is nice for when playing small pick up games or while waiting for a field to clear up for use. The stakes are nice, since the goals are lightweight and could be easily moved or even blown away in heavy wind.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Markley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for VBS
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for VBS. They do not require much room for storage. Plastic stakes work nicely to keep the goal in place with fairly rough play. Kids have landed on the goal and they pop right back into place. We are excited to have the goals for Vacation Bible School!
customer_reviews.author: Tab

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent!!! I got this to play with my daughters in the back yard, and it has worked great. Very easy to set up and take down, its nice that it comes with cones. I read many reviews prior to deciding to purchase this set, and I am glad I decided on this set. The steaks have worked well. I have had this for 1 week and used it several times without any problems. It also came with a flyer with an email to get in touch with the company to have repairs made if damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Guernsey

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Kids can set these up very easy. Cones are nice size and the bag is a great option to keep it all together in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Simple

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item for my grandson for his birthday in April....both nets have broken and it has been less than three months...he is an only child and plays with his dad so they were not abused....Will not buy this brand again!!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa M. Tabb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect set!
customer_reviews.text: Great set! lightweight, easy to travel with. I have a 7yo, 5yo and 1 yo and we all kick around the soccer ball into these goals. We use the small orange cones too. good purchase, we got the 4ft goals
customer_reviews.author: chand21

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than expect!
customer_reviews.text: This pop-up soccer goal is perfect for our U11 soccer practices. I am very pleased with the quality and the price. The cones included with the package are even better quality than I excepted. The color I received to me is more of an orange than a red, but I am still happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Soccer Mom

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Terrific product, strong materials, plenty of anchors, and easy to fold and store -- all at an affordable price compared to other brands. Good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: NY-Rangers-Fan-1

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Our 3
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Our 3, 5, and 7 year old love them. So glad I didn't get the small ones!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Easy for travel. We bring it to other people’s house who don’t have kiddos and don’t have outside toys. Pretty slick!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Goals
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Bought it for my 6-7 year old girl's team to use during practice. Seems sturdy and the best part was that parents were able to easily fold it up without breaking it.
customer_reviews.author: Bruin5252

customer_reviews.title: Great while it lasted.
customer_reviews.text: This was a nice on the go soccer goal setup but only lasted three months. One of the goals fabric separated leaving it completely useless.
customer_reviews.author: Teddy Haney

product_meta.title: GoSports Portable Pop-Up Soccer Goal (Set of 2), Red/White, 4'
product_meta.description: The GoSports Pop Up Soccer Goals are designed to provide the ultimate pair of portable goals for training, scrimmages or games. The set includes 2 Goals (choose from 2.5ft / 4ft / 6ft widths) that fold flat and weigh under 3 pounds total. The goals do not require any assembly, but rather 'pop' open for immediate use. To close them, you simply twist and fold them into a flat shape and store them in the included carrying case so they can be taken anywhere. The goals are made from premium nylon fabric and netting that can withstand even the strongest shots. The goals can be staked into the grass using the included stakes, or can be taped onto the ground if you are playing on a hard court (tape not included). The goals are lined in a high visibility reflective fabric so they can be used in low light conditions. These are great for many different applications: youth soccer games, goalie less games, skills training, backyard setups and more. The set also includes 6 training cones that allow you to mark the 4 corners as well as the field half. The goals come with a full GoSports lifetime warranty and US based customer service, so we are here to help if anything goes wrong.
feature_bullets: INSTANT SETUP: Collapsible goalie nets setup and takedown in seconds - no assembly required
FULL PORTABLE SOCCER SET: Includes 2 small 4' foldable soccer goals, 6 cones & carrying case!
PLAY ANYWHERE: Includes plastic & metal stakes to secure the goals to any backyard grass surface
MUST HAVE FOR PLAYERS & COACHES: Perfect soccer training equipment for youth/adult games, practices and more!
